Take its easy with NTSC-games on PAL-machines. You might brick(damage) your console. Newer games often include an update, which it will install if you havnt updated the Wii console by yourself. And if updates NTSC-software on your PAL-machine then it will break.

Use WiiBrickblocker 1.3 to remove that update from the burnt disc.. Happy gaming!

Correction!

Use WiiBrickblocker 1.3 on the iso-file, BEFORE burning the disc. (duh ;)

I am uploading it whenever I am online, but I am thinking why to load when I am not able to play it. Do you guys want it? Is there anyone who is running this game successfully?

If you want to use USBLoader GX, then you must install WBFS Manager and use it transfer games to your USB Drive. Find, download and then run the games. I am thinking of buying a big External HDD to run and keep wii games
